items.title: Why Did Ichor Holdings Stock Crash 30% Today?
items.description: Ichor expects a tough fourth quarter, forecasting a revenue of $210 million to $230 million.

items.title: Palantir, Hertz, Metsera, Uber, DraftKings: Stocks Making The Biggest Moves Today
items.description: Palantir shares were down 7% in Tuesday’s midday session despite upbeat earnings as concerns about valuation gained momentum.

items.title: Norwegian Cruise Line Adjusts Yield Outlook Amid Family Booking Push
items.description: During the third-quarter earnings call, CFO Mark Kempa said the cruise line operator anticipates Q4 net yield growth of about 3.5% to 4%.

items.title: Hertz Executive Flags Q4 Softness Amid Seasonal Leisure Lull, Government Shutdown Impact
items.description: The company’s quarterly revenue came in at $2.48 billion, compared with expectations of $2.40 billion.
